scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test nyc --clean --reporter=lcovonly --reporter=json --reporter=text mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register specs/setup.js --recursive 'specs/*/*.spec.js' --reporter spec
scripts.build-circle: npm run build-circle:ios && npm run build-circle:android
scripts.stage-circle: npm run stage-circle:ios && npm run stage-circle:android
scripts.stage-circle:ios: npm run build-circle:ios && aws s3 sync /tmp/build/ios s3://assets-development.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=10 --content-type application/javascript
scripts.stage-circle:android: npm run build-circle:android && aws s3 sync /tmp/build/android s3://assets-development.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=10 --content-type application/javascript
scripts.deploy-circle: npm run deploy-circle:ios && npm run deploy-circle:android
scripts.deploy-circle:ios: npm run build-circle:ios && aws s3 sync /tmp/build/ios s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --content-type application/javascript
scripts.deploy-circle:android: npm run build-circle:android && aws s3 sync /tmp/build/android s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=600 --content-type application/javascript
scripts.build: npm run build:ios && npm run build:android
scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output build/ios/index.ios.bundle
scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output build/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest build/android/assets/
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:ios && npm run deploy:android
scripts.stage: npm run stage:ios && npm run stage:android
scripts.stage:ios: npm run build:ios && aws s3 sync build/ios s3://assets-development.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=10 --content-type application/javascript
scripts.stage:android: npm run build:android && aws s3 sync build/android s3://assets-development.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=10 --content-type application/javascript
scripts.deploy:ios: npm run build:ios && aws s3 sync build/ios s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --content-type application/javascript
scripts.deploy:android: npm run build:android && aws s3 sync build/android s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/Hooks-RN/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=600 --content-type application/javascript
